parameters.name: AppName
parameters.description: The name of the application to which the live stream belongs.

parameters.name: Order
parameters.description:
The rule that is used to sort entries. Valid values:

*   **asc**: sorted in the ascending order. This is the default value.
*   **desc**: sorted in the descending order.

parameters.name: PageNum
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: **5 to 30**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: StreamName
parameters.description: The name of the live stream.
